    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Caltrop Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=332)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=146" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 590 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This snare consists of a hidden canister of [caltrops](/Equipment.aspx?ID=9) attached to a trip wire. When the snare is triggered, it flings the caltrops into either the snare’s square or a square adjacent to the snare. You choose which square when you set up the snare.

 If the caltrops scatter into the same square as a creature, that creature must attempt the Acrobatics check immediately.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a container of caltrops.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Caltrop Snare
